wikipedia_page.main: John Atkinson, Baron Atkinson,  (13 December 1844 – 13 March 1932) was an Irish politician and judge. He was a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary from 1905 to 1928.

response: *13 March – John Atkinson, Baron Atkinson, politician and judge, Attorney-General for Ireland and Law Lord (born 1844).
* John Atkinson, Baron Atkinson (1844–1932), Irish lawyer and politician
